import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the read-only "../input/" directory
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

#plotly

import plotly.graph_objects as go
from plotly.offline import init_notebook_mode, iplot
from plotly import tools
init_notebook_mode(connected=True)
import plotly.figure_factory as ff
import plotly.express as px

plt.style.use('seaborn-darkgrid')

orange_black = ['#fdc029', '#df861d', 'FF6347', '#aa3d01',
                '#a30e15', '#800000', '#171820']

plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (10,5) 
plt.rcParams['figure.facecolor'] = '#FFFACD' 
plt.rcParams['axes.facecolor'] = 'FFFFE0' 
plt.rcParams['axes.grid'] = True 
plt.rcParams['grid.color'] = orange_black[3]
plt.rcParams['grid.linestyle'] = '--'

source.275d1fd1:
fig = go.Figure()
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2008"], name="2008", line=dict(color='firebrick', width=1,dash='dash')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2009"], name="2009", line=dict(color='#FF97FF', width=1,dash='dot')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2010"], name="2010", line=dict(color='blue', width=1, dash='dashdot')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2011"], name="2011", line=dict(color='#FF6692', width=1,dash='dash')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2012"], name="2012", line=dict(color='#19D3F3', width=1,dash='dot')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2013"], name="2013", line=dict(color='#FFA15A', width=1, dash='dashdot')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2014"], name="2014", line=dict(color='#AB63FA', width=1, dash='dash')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2015"], name="2015", line=dict(color='#00CC96', width=1,dash='dot')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2016"], name="2016", line=dict(color='#EF553B', width=1,dash='dashdot')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["2017"], name="2017", line=dict(color='#636EFA', width=1, dash='dash')))
fig.add_trace(go.Scatter(x=ft_rate['DISTRICS'], y=ft_rate["Average"], name="Average", line=dict(color='black', width=4)))


fig.update_layout(title='Fatality rate across the different Districts for Given Year and Vehicle at fault- PVT-LTD',
                   xaxis_title='Districts',
                   yaxis_title='Probability of Fality')

fig.show()
